name: Horse Spankin
description:
Alt.ctrl game jam I did for my program! To play, you need access to a MakeyMakey and a Wiimote with Motion Plus. Ideally, you wanna build a toy horse out of it. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Justin McKague - Programmer, Level Design

Justin Vrieling - Programmer, Level Design

Jordan Baltich - Controller Design, Asset Creation

Morgan Lyn - Controller Design, Video Trailer

Emily Bendevis - Asset Creation, Level Design, Video Trailer
